participant_1.background:

my cat died.
when i retire i want to open a bakery.
I am a female in my early 20s.

participant_2.background:
I made many memories with my family last year.
i am married to a man.
I start my morning with a walk around the neighborhood to get some fresh air and see what's going on at the local shops.
I once worked as a circus freak, showing off my third thumb to the public.
i have a marketing job.

content.text: Pretty good, just got back from a walk. How about you?
Not much, just got off work. How was the walk?
It was nice, I got to see some of my friends. What do you do for work?
I'm a baker, how about you?
I work in marketing, but I used to be a circus freak.
That sounds like a really cool job! How long were you a freak for?
I worked for the circus for about 5 years, but I quit when I got married.
That's understandable, I'm sure it was hard to be away from your family.
It was, but it was a great experience. What made you want to be a baker?
I've always loved baking, and I thought it would be a good career.
That's awesome, I'm glad you found your dream job!
Well, I'm going to go make some breakfast. It was nice talking to you!
You too, have a good day!
